footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Raiden Shogun | Update Date: 08/21/2022 | Editor: ~Z~#0009

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Engulfing Lightning__
The best in slot for Raiden as it's easily the best choice for both Dmg and Energy generation

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__The Catch (R5)__
The Catch at r5 is arguably better than any non-Engulfing Lightning option due to the better energy regeneration it offers for a minimal dmg difference
This is free, there's no reason to not get this if you don't have Engulfing (We all know fishing isn't fun, do it anyways)

__Staff of Homa, Primordial Jade Winged-Spear__
Both offer comparable dmg or better dmg than anything not named Engulfing Lightning but honestly are better used elsewhere since the Catch is free

__Skyward Spine__
One of the few instances where Skyward Spine might be preferable to the other options as its Atk Spd increase makes Raiden combos easier to do

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
Atk% Sands will generally deal more dmg but will lower Raiden's energy regeneration for the team

Due to the high amount of Dmg % in Raiden's kit, her Goblet can also be better as Atk% instead of Electro Dmg in some cases

4 piece Emblem is the only artifact set that should be used on Raiden. Nothing else comes close
